skills.name: Touch of Corruption
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times with each attack having a 20% chance to inflict Continuous Damage for 1 turn. This damage of this attack will increase according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.5*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.08*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Body Roll
skills.description: Slams the body with the enemy at the cost of 10% of your current HP, dealing 20% of your current HP to the enemy as damage.

skills.name: Poisoned Body(Passive)
skills.description: Becomes immune to Continuous Damage. When being attacked, the attackers will suffer Continuous Damage for 1 turn. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn
